tools.name: scb_get_api_status
tools.description: Get API configuration and rate limit information from Statistics Sweden

tools.name: scb_search_tables
tools.description: Search for statistical tables in the SCB database. IMPORTANT: Swedish search terms give MUCH better results. Use "befolkning" not "population", "arbetslöshet" not "unemployment", "inkomst" not "income".

query.description: Search term - USE SWEDISH for best results. Examples: "befolkning" (population), "arbetslöshet" (unemployment), "inkomst" (income), "bostäder" (housing), "miljö" (environment).

pastDays.description: Only show tables updated in the last N days

tools.name: scb_get_table_info
tools.description: Get detailed metadata about a specific statistical table

tools.name: scb_get_table_data
tools.description: Get statistical data from a table with optional filtering. Without selection, returns a smart default subset (latest time period, all categories). Use scb_preview_data for a quick preview first.

selection.description: Optional variable selection. Format: {"VariableName": ["value1", "value2"]}. Use "*" for all values, "TOP(5)" for latest 5. If omitted, API uses smart defaults.

tools.name: scb_check_usage
tools.description: Check current API usage and rate limit status

tools.name: scb_search_regions
tools.description: Search for region codes by name (e.g., find code for "Lerum", "Stockholm"). Supports fuzzy matching for Swedish characters.

tools.name: scb_get_table_variables
tools.description: Get available variables and their possible values for a table (essential before fetching data)

variableName.description: Optional: Show values for specific variable only (e.g., "region", "kön")

tools.name: scb_find_region_code
tools.description: Find the exact region code for a specific municipality or area. Supports fuzzy matching (e.g., "Goteborg" matches "Göteborg").

tableId.description: Optional: Specific table to search for region codes (ensures compatibility)

tools.name: scb_test_selection
tools.description: Test if a data selection is valid without retrieving data (prevents API errors). Always use this before scb_get_table_data.

selection.description: Variable selection to test (optional). Format: { "VariableName": ["value1", "value2"] }. Empty selection will validate that defaults can be used.

tools.name: scb_preview_data
tools.description: Get a small preview of data (max ~50 rows) to verify table structure and selection before fetching full data. Safer than scb_get_table_data for initial exploration.

selection.description: Optional variable selection (automatically limited to small sample). If omitted, uses smart defaults.

prompts.name: analyze-regional-statistics
prompts.description: Analysera regional statistik för en specifik kommun eller län

prompts.name: compare-municipalities
prompts.description: Jämför statistik mellan två eller flera kommuner

arguments.name: municipalities
arguments.description: Kommaseparerad lista av kommuner att jämföra (t.ex. "Stockholm,Göteborg,Malmö")

prompts.name: find-statistics-table
prompts.description: Hjälp användaren hitta rätt SCB-tabell för sitt ändamål

arguments.name: topic
arguments.description: Beskriv vilken typ av statistik du letar efter (t.ex. "befolkningsutveckling", "företagsetableringar", "bostadspriser")

prompts.name: build-custom-query
prompts.description: Steg-för-steg guide för att bygga en komplex SCB-query med rätt variabler och värden

arguments.name: table_id
arguments.description: ID för SCB-tabellen att hämta data från (t.ex. "TAB5663")

arguments.name: description
arguments.description: Beskriv vad du vill ha ut ur tabellen

prompts.name: employment-trend-analysis
prompts.description: Analysera sysselsättnings- och arbetslöshetstrend för en region över tid

arguments.name: region
arguments.description: Region att analysera (kommun, län eller riket)

prompts.name: population-demographics
prompts.description: Hämta demografisk information för en region (ålder, kön, födelseöverskott, etc.)

resources.name: LLM Instructions (Start Here!)
resources.description: Complete instructions for AI assistants using SCB MCP Server - read this first!

resources.name: Statistics Categories
resources.description: Detailed guide to SCB statistical categories with search terms

resources.name: All Swedish Regions (312)
resources.description: Complete database of all Swedish regions - 21 counties and 290 municipalities

resources.name: Swedish Counties (Län)
resources.description: List of all 21 Swedish counties with their region codes

resources.name: All Swedish Municipalities (290)
resources.description: Complete list of all 290 Swedish municipalities with their region codes

resources.name: Search Categories
resources.description: Available categories for filtering table searches

resources.name: Search Tips
resources.description: Tips for effective searching in SCB database
